title: Core Admin UI issues on Chrome
description: Trying to click on any of the buttons apparently has no affect. They also have no icons next to them anymore and appear down the left.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:
Antony: please provide some more details...

1) What browser?, what OS? Do you have any sort of browser developer tool extensions installed so you could check for javascript errors?

2) what about on the solr server side? what do the solr logs say when you load this pages?

3) "anymore" suggests this worked for you at one time – what changed?  did it work for you in an earlier snapshot of the 4x branch, and then not work in 4.0-ALPHA, or did it at one point work for you in 4.0-ALPHA and then stop working after some time passed?

comments.author: Antony Stubbs
comments.content:
Chrome. Osx. No active tools. Nothing in the logs when i click.
Yes, was running a snapshot build from February. This is my first try of ALPHA.

comments.author: Antony Stubbs
comments.content: Ah - sorry guys. Should have tried it out in the others. It appears to render and perform actions correctly in FireFox and Safari. I.e. it's not even a webkit level issue - it only doesn't seem to work in Chrome.

comments.author: Antony Stubbs
comments.content: There were also other parts of the UI that I realise now that I wasn't seeing correctly - that dashboard, and the java properties views.

comments.author: Antony Stubbs
comments.content: Lowering priority as it seems to work fine in safari and firefox, just not Chrome.
